bounceBallTooltip: Bounce a ball off of an object.
finalLevel: Congratulations! You have solved the final puzzle.
ifTooltip: If there is a path in the specified direction, then do some actions.
ifelseTooltip: If there is a path in the specified direction, then do the first block of actions. Otherwise, do the second block of actions.
incrementOpponentScoreTooltip: वर्तमान प्रतिद्वंद्वी के स्कोर में एक  जोड़ें।
incrementPlayerScoreTooltip: वर्तमान खिलाडी के स्कोर में एक  जोड़ें।
isWallTooltip: return true अगर वहा दीवार है ।
moveLeftTooltip: Move the paddle to the left.
moveRightTooltip: Move the paddle to the right.
nextLevel: Congratulations! You have completed this puzzle.
numBlocksNeeded: This puzzle can be solved with %1 blocks.
reinfFeedbackMsg: You can press the "Try again" button to go back to playing your game.
setBallSpeedTooltip: Sets the speed of the ball
setPaddleSpeedTooltip: Sets the speed of the paddle
shareBounceTwitter: Check out the Bounce game I made. I wrote it myself with @codeorg
turnTooltip: Turns me left or right by 90 degrees.
whenBallInGoalTooltip: Execute the actions below when a ball enters the goal.
whenBallMissesPaddleTooltip: Execute the actions below when a ball misses the paddle.
whenDownTooltip: Execute the actions below when the Down arrow button is pressed.
whenGameStartsTooltip: Execute the actions below when the game starts.
whenLeftTooltip: Execute the actions below when the Left arrow button is pressed.
whenPaddleCollidedTooltip: Execute the actions below when a ball collides with a paddle.
whenRightTooltip: Execute the actions below when the Right arrow button is pressed.
whenUpTooltip: Execute the actions below when the Up arrow button is pressed.
whenWallCollidedTooltip: Execute the actions below when a ball collides with a wall.
whileTooltip: Repeat the enclosed actions until finish point is reached.
